description:
exp/template/html: add doc comments for undocumented Err... constants.

Does some TODOs and changes the term "div" in an error message
to "division" to avoid confusion with "<div>".

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5141047/diff/6004/src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5141047/diff/6004/src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go#newcode69
src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go:69: //   are banned in tag names, attribute names, and nquoted attribute
On 2011/09/27 19:43:23, r wrote:
> s/nquoted/unquoted/

Done.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5141047/diff/6004/src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5141047/diff/6004/src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go#newcode69
src/pkg/exp/template/html/error.go:69: //   are banned in tag names, attribute names, and nquoted attribute
s/nquoted/unquoted/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=78d2a93cf815 ***

exp/template/html: add doc comments for undocumented Err... constants.

Does some TODOs and changes the term "div" in an error message
to "division" to avoid confusion with "<div>".

R=nigeltao, r
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5141047: exp/template/html: add doc comments for undocumented Er...
